data.actual_result: Discord registers the wrong number of taps
data.expected_result: Discord registers the number of taps you do
data.short_description: Tapping an emoji reaction quickly causes the wrong number of taps to be registered
data.steps_to_repro: - Have someone add a reaction to a message - Quickly tap the reaction multiple times (I tapped twice each time) - Observe what happens to the reaction - Repeat tapping the reaction quickly multiple times, observing what happens each time
